plot: Two young girls try to build a tower, but time and TV oppose them. "Destruction" reflects on the influence of TV in children's lives.
title: Destrucción
plot_es: Two young girls try to build a tower, but time and TV oppose them. "Destruction" reflects on the influence of TV in children's lives.
plot_en: Two young girls try to build a tower, but time and TV oppose them. "Destruction" reflects on the influence of TV in children's lives.
